There are missing jap. episodes between dvd 6 and 7.
Episode 55-67 to be exact. but you can find those episodes in english dubbed instead on dvd.
I think the jap episode 55 is episode 42 of the dubbed version, and you can find that one on dvd 5. I havent checked if there are any other missing episodes, but it doesnt look like it.
Dont download this torrent if it's the japanese version you're interested in, because the subtitles are horrible and some sentences arent even translated.
Besides these arent the real dvd's, they're just ripped episodes that has been compressed into decent quality and then placed onto these dvds.
But thanks for uploading them anyway, it's allways nice to have all the english ones :)

to LiL_Killa:
There's is no extra material on the dvds.
The menus are homemade from the looks of it.
There's more then 246 DBZ episodes.
277 english dubbed ones and 291 japanese and all the english ones are here
